name: Minicraft Shooter
description:
Minicraft Shooter is an epic time killer shooter with a top view in which you face an endless crowd of zombies, in the scenery of a cyberpunk metropolis, a modern city and a green forest. Each of the locations has its own unique soundtrack, the whole game is completely made in a recognizable cubic style.

Features


  • Convenient operation. Shooting zombies depends only on your skills
  • Three beautiful levels with different design and time of day
  • Voxel cube style!
